name: Shrine Reaper
description:
For all of eternity, you remain here- bound to protect this very shrine.

Shrine Reaper is a tiny game made for Mini Jam 25: Spirits with the limitation No Text. It is a simplistic bullet hell about a maiden bound to protect her shrine for all of eternity.

Unpolished as it is, I hope that anyone giving this game a shot will enjoy the experience.

Controls
WASD - Movement
Left Mouse Button - Projectiles
Spacebar - Sword
